title: Naming convention for the machines in the cloud

content.raw:
I am just wondering if the names are properly chosen. Currently, we can start using cloudsim:

* simulator
* vpc_trio
* vpc_micro_trio
* cloudsim

As far as I now we are just launching a set of machines with our software but we are not launching specific programs from here (this is done later). I believe it might clarify if we rename the names to match the current configuration of the constellation. Specifically, I propose to change 'simulator' by vpc_single or something similar that shows there is only one machine. Maybe in the future we do not run a simulator within this machine.
